    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        protected Question(int id,
                   java.lang.String question,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> topics,
                   java.lang.String resource,
                   Question.QuestionType type,
                   boolean publicity,
                   int difficulty,
                   int correctAnswers,
                   int falseAnswers,
                   User owner)
        Protected constructor to let derived classes set the common variables on initialization
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the question
        question - Text (body) of the question
        topics - List of topics this question associated to
        resource - Path of the resource for question, if it has
        type - QuestionType of the question
        publicity - Publicity of question
        difficulty - Difficulty defined by the creator for question
        correctAnswers - Count of correct answers given to the question
        falseAnswers - Count of false answers given to the question
        owner - Creator of the question

      • Search

        public boolean Search(java.lang.String criteria,
                      java.lang.String term)
        Search method implementation for Searchable interface to be able to compare with given criteria of given term
        Specified by:
        Search in interface Searchable
        Parameters:
        criteria - Criteria to look if question provides
        term - Term to search the given criteria
        Returns:
        Boolean result, true if the criteria is provided, else false
